text: dhlk aldhy 'asabahum fi aldnya, wama yusibahum fi alakhrt; bsbb 'anahum kanat taatihim rusul allah bialayat albayinat walmejzat alwadhat, faqaluu mnkryn: 'abashar mithlina yrshdwnna? fakafaruu biallah wajahaduu risalatan rslh, waerdu ean alhaqu falam yqblwh. waastaghnaa allh, wallah ghny, lah alghna alttami almtlq, hamid fi aqwalh wafealh wsfath la ybaly bhm, wala yaduruh dlalhm shyyana
